Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Animation on transition-group changes in position not working" (#6792) at vuejs/vue
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
2.5.0

### Reproduction link
[https://jsfiddle.net/b2cxLdtb/](https://jsfiddle.net/b2cxLdtb/)

### Steps to reproduce
See the jsfiddle link.

### What is expected?
After clicking on an "Up" or "Down" link in the "Actions" column, the row should change position with the adjacent row using an animation taking 2 seconds.

### What is actually happening?
The row changes position, but it is immediate.

---
This was working in 2.4.4.

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "VueRouter with children and named routes. Components won't load" (#1806) at vuejs/vue-router
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
3.0.0

### Reproduction link
[https://jsfiddle.net/chrisvfritz/50wL7mdz/](https://jsfiddle.net/chrisvfritz/50wL7mdz/)

### Steps to reproduce
I can't make the children's components work, no matter what I do they won't load anything. As you can see in my router file I in fact am currently trying 2 different setup for the component import but nothing works.

I also tried not having components at all in the main path and only load them from the children, still wasn't working.

This is my current setup

router.js

    {
        path: '/beats',
        components: {
            navbar: Navbar,
        },
        children: [{
                path: 'catalog',
                name: 'BeatsCatalog',
                component: BeatsCatalog,

            },
            {
                path: 'upload',
                name: 'BeatsUpload',
                components: {
                    default: () => import ('@/views/BeatsUpload'),
                },
            },
        ]
    },

App.vue

    <template lang="pug">
    #app
    	modal-manager
    	router-view(name="navbar")
    	router-view
    </template>


What I'm trying to do is have the navbar by default in all my children, and inside the children just load the main component for the view.

I've tried any type variation and I can't make it work. What am I doing wrong? 

### What is expected?
Vue router to load the components inside the children

### What is actually happening?
They are not being loaded and no error is shown

<!-- generated by vue-issues. DO NOT REMOVE -->
